channel.title: Moving to SSL -- if forum is down, join Discord
channel.description:
Discord is our #1 source of reliable news/info/updates --
Join us >> https://discord.gg/gvNbRSB
We took a backup, just in case. We'll begin to move this to SSL (https) soon. The forum will likely be down. Hopefully you receive this email notification, if anything ;)
